channel.title: Test on Chi-Kuang Yeh/葉啓光
channel.description: Recent content in Test on Chi-Kuang Yeh/葉啓光

item.title: Math Test
item.description: Math Test This is a test of math equations. Display Equation [ y = \beta_0 + \beta_1 x + \varepsilon, \quad \varepsilon \sim N(0, \sigma^2) ] Another Display Equation $$ E[X] = \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} x f(x) dx $$ Inline Equations The mean is (\mu) and the variance is (\sigma^2). More Complex Equation [ \frac{\partial f}{\partial x} = \lim_{h \to 0} \frac{f(x + h) - f(x)}{h} ]
